reg_pit.title: Superintendent of Motor Vehicles Records Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 154/2020, effective June 26, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: those records, each of which sets out or describes, with respect to a person, particulars of or pertaining to a prohibition from operating a motor vehicle imposed under section 91, 92, 93, 98, 99, 100 or 215 of the Act or section 7 (2) (f) or (3) of the Young Offenders (British Columbia) Act;

change.changenote: Section 2 (d) was added by BC Reg 154/2020, effective June 26, 2020.
